comment.author: 24052676@N03
comment._content:
Wow I remember Saxone shoes! Worked in London Wall in the 70's and 80's it looked the same then. All different now and not sure if this corner was affected in the bombing in the City?

Also people looked so smart even in those ten years or so after the war ended and times were still hard.
